com.illcode.meterman.event

Interface GameActionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicWorldManager

    public interface GameActionListener
    A GameActionListener is notified before and after the player chooses an action.
    See Also:
    GameManager.entityActionSelected(String)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postAction(String action, Entity e, boolean actionHandled)
      Called at the end of the action-processing chain regardless if the chain was interrupted (i.e.
      boolean processAction(String action, Entity e, boolean beforeAction)
      Called when an action is sent to the selected entity.

    • Method Detail

      • processAction

        boolean processAction(String action,
                    Entity e,
                    boolean beforeAction)
        Called when an action is sent to the selected entity. It may be called twice per action, once before the action has actually been processed, and once after, if not interrupted by another GameActionListener or Entity.processAction(String).
        Parameters:
        action - action name
        e - selected entity
        beforeAction - true if the method is being called before the action has reached the entity; false if it is called after
        Returns:
        true to indicate that this listener processed the action, and to prevent further processing; false to continue the processing chain.

      • postAction

        void postAction(String action,
              Entity e,
              boolean actionHandled)
        Called at the end of the action-processing chain regardless if the chain was interrupted (i.e. handled) by a listener or the entity.
        Parameters:
        action - action name
        e - selected entity
        actionHandled - true if the action was processed (by a listener or the entity returning true) at any point in the chain, or false otherwise.
